tossup_question: -  9)  – 	Which of the following clouds develops at the highest altitude?
bonus_question: -   –  The Galápagos Islands consist of a single active volcano among volcanic islands whose ages increase westward. Based on this knowledge, what geologic scenario is creating the islands?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)Subduction
X)Hot spot
Y)Sea floor spreading
Z)Continental rifting
